nodes.text: The Brentaal System was a star system in the Bormea sector of the Core Worlds that contained at least one planet, the gas giant Cavas. During the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire carried out an incursion into the Bormea sector, using jamming ships to cause communications blackouts for the New Republic. Commander Lindon Javes sent Vanguard Squadron to investigate these blackouts on the edge of the Brentaal System and re-establish communications.
Brentaal System was first identified in Star Wars canon in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons. The Brentaal system first appeared in Star Wars Legends.
